releaseNotes: Critical Bug Fixes and Improvements - Fixed critical bug where missed days weren't detected after app restart - Improved missed day detection logic for better user guidance - Enhanced navigation reliability in program reset functionality - Fixed navigation bar display issues in DailyChecklistView - Improved Settings view layout and scrolling behavior - Enhanced app performance and responsiveness - Better user workflow and navigation consistency - Enhanced feature reliability and stability - Optimized data handling and storage - Multiple bug fixes and stability improvements
